Content: 14*p44489a01424* (c) rhodospin is found in rod cells in the retina of mammalian eyes. Title: June 2014
Content: 20*p44489a02024* *(e) by the end of 1951, the world was in the midst of the biggest polio epidemic in history (paragraph 19).  this was caused by poliovirus which can lead to paralysis (paragraph 20).  the virus infects motor neurones which can stop skeletal muscles from working.  suggest how an infection of motor neurones by the virus can stop the transmission of nerve impulses and lead to muscle paralysis.(6)
